meta.name: description
meta.content: Norwin School District, the home of the Knights, serves the communities of North Huntingdon, Irwin and North Irwin in Westmoreland County, Pennsylvania.

h3.a: Norwin Board of Directors: Virtual Board Meeting Monday, April 20, 2020

div.div: In compliance with the guidance of Governor Wolf’s Declaration of Emergency, the Norwin Board of School Directors will be meeting on Monday, April 20, 2020, beginning at 6:30 p.m. via an online format only.

h3.a: Online Instruction Continues for Norwin Students until Further Notice

div.div: Because all Pennsylvania schools are closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year, Norwin will continue its Continuity of Education Plan for Online Learning. Together We Can get through this difficult time and remain #NorwinStrong.

h3.a: Two Norwin Teachers Use 3D printers to Make Protective Face Shields for North Huntingdon EMS/Rescue

div.div:
Two Norwin School District teachers are using 3D printers to make protective face shields for North Huntingdon EMS/Rescue.
Mr. Robert Shuber, Technology Education Department Chair, and Mr. Jared Schultz, a Computer Science Teacher at both Stewartsville and Sunset Valley Elementary Schools, used the District’s MakerBot 3D printers for this community service project.

h3.a: Norwin Technology Department Provides More than 500 Chromebooks, iPads to Families in Need of Technology

div.div: The Norwin Technology Department coordinated a large-scale project to provide Chromebooks and iPads to Norwin families who indicated that they did not have enough technology in their homes to allow for effective online instruction.
